actions.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 82 - 343 (Roll no. 172).

description: Amendment sought to phase out the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences and change the current minimum active duty requirement for the graduates of the Health Profession Scholarship Program to seven years.
purpose: An amendment to phase out the Uniformed Services University of the Health Science (DOD medical school) and changes the current minimum active duty requirement for the graduates of the Health Profession Scholarship Program to seven years.
